title: Special anniversary coming up
body:
so March 28th is my birthday and I was hoping beyond hope that a rioter would play a game with me then, The 28th is also a very special day since it will mark a year since I downloaded League on my computer and started to play every day (and spent about 250-250$ on Rp since then).
S0 please someone make my wish come true and play a game with me

replies.body:
Hi there! 

I'd be happy to play a game with you! :3 I'll mark it on my calendar! What time is good for you?

On the 28th anytime around 10 Cst (8 pst) would be great for me :D
thank you so much :3
Great that some rioters respond to these types of threads! Happy B day OP
